definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: crimson, carmine, i.e. crimson stuff, cloth; late (prob. Pers. loan-word, and a derive. fr. Pers. kirm worm, v. De:ZDuth. Th. 1878, 593);—only 2Ch 2:6, 2Ch 2:13, 2Ch 3:14 (in all + ([[וּוׇן]])[[אַרְגׇּמָן ]] [[תְּלֵלֶת]] 2Ch 2:13, 2Ch 3:14 + [[בּוּץ]] also ); rd. perh. also for [[כַּדְמֶל]] Ct So 7:6 (‖[[אַרְגׇּוׇן]]: so Gi, of hair formed spirally, like shell-fish; Gr, of glossy hair).
